name: Shoot'em Up Short Game
description:
Description:

Play as an airplane and defeat the enemies to reach the boss in this demo game featuring my newest Construct 2/3 template. Play with its features and experiment the bullet patterns included in the Test Zone. I hope you have fun!

Game Features:
  • Choose between 3 different colors for your airplane;
  • 2 stages full of enemies and a boss on the end;
  • Use bombs, collect points and energy to upgrade your power;
  • Play using keyboard on computer;
  • Resolution 364x640.
Controls:

Use the arrow keys to move the airplane;

Shoot with Z key;

Use bombs with X key;

Focus your mini pods pressing and holding Shift key.
